cdse-s3.title: Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem S3
cdse-s3.description: This endpoint provides access to EO data which is stored on the object storage of both CloudFerro Cloud and OpenTelekom Cloud (OTC). See the [documentation](https://documentation.dataspace.copernicus.eu/APIs/S3.html) for more information, including how to get credentials.

creodias-s3.title: CREODIAS S3
creodias-s3.description: Comprehensive Earth Observation Data (EODATA) archive offered by CREODIAS as a commercial part of CDSE, designed to provide users with access to a vast repository of satellite data without predefined quota limits.

delta_time.description: offset from reference start time of measurement

time_utc.description: Time of observation as ISO 8601 date-time string

sulfurdioxide_total_vertical_column.description: total vertical column of sulfur dioxide for the polluted scenario derived from the total slant column

sulfurdioxide_total_vertical_column_prec.description: precision of the total vertical column of sulfur dioxide for the polluted scenario derived from the total slant column

cloud_fraction_crb.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction from the CRB model

cloud_fraction_crb_precision.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction precision from the CRB model

cloud_pressure_crb.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure from the CRB model

cloud_pressure_crb_precision.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure precision from the CRB model

cloud_height_crb.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height from the CRB model

cloud_height_crb_precision.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height precision from the CRB model

cloud_albedo_crb.description: cloud albedo from the CRB model

cloud_albedo_crb_precision.description: cloud albedo precision from the CRB model

northward_wind.description: Northward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

eastward_wind.description: Eastward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

sulfurdioxide_total_vertical_column_true.description: systematic error of the total vertical column density of sulfur dioxide for the polluted scenario

fitted_slant_columns_win1.description: slant columns of all absorbers in fitting window 1

fitted_slant_columns_win1_precision.description: slant column random errors of all absorbers in fitting window 1

fitted_slant_columns_win2.description: slant columns of all absorbers in fitting window 2

fitted_slant_columns_win2_precision.description: slant column random all absorbers in fitting window 2

fitted_slant_columns_win3.description: slant columns of all absorbers in fitting window 3

fitted_slant_columns_win3_precision.description: slant column random errors of all absorbers in fitting window 3

selected_fitting_window_flag.description: flag describing the selected fitting window for sulfur dioxide retrieval

sulfurdioxide_slant_column_corrected.description: background corrected sulfur dioxide slant column density for final selected fitting window

sulfurdioxide_slant_column_corrected_tru.description: systematic error of the corrected sulfur dioxide slant column

sulfurdioxide_slant_column_corrected_win.description: background corrected sulfur dioxide slant column density for fitting window 1
background corrected sulfur dioxide slant column density for fitting window 2
background corrected sulfur dioxide slant column density for fitting window 3

fitted_root_mean_square_win1.description: root mean square residual of the fit in fitting window 1

fitted_root_mean_square_win2.description: root mean square residual of the fit in fitting window 2

fitted_root_mean_square_win3.description: root mean square residual of the fit in fitting window 3

sulfurdioxide_profile_apriori.description: volume mixing ratio profile of sulfur dioxide

fitted_radiance_shift.description: radiance wavelength shift from the doas fit

fitted_radiance_squeeze.description: radiance wavelength squeeze from the doas fit

fitted_radiance_shift_win1.description: radiance wavelength shift from the doas fit in fitting window 1

fitted_radiance_squeeze_win1.description: radiance wavelength squeeze from the doas fit in fitting window 1

number_of_spectral_points_in_retrieval.description: Number of spectral points used in the DOAS retrieval

number_of_spectral_points_in_retrieval_w.description: Number of spectral points used in the DOAS retrieval for window 1

fitted_radiance_shift_win2.description: radiance wavelength shift from the doas fit in fitting window 2

number_of_spectral_points_in_retrieval_w.description: Number of spectral points used in the DOAS retrieval for window 2

number_of_spectral_points_in_retrieval_w.description: Number of spectral points used in the DOAS retrieval for window 3
